name: The Traveller (Sovaka)
description:
The Traveller is a Sci-Fi VR experience created as a prototype game for a Game Development course by the University of Canberra.

You are an explorer of mirror worlds where almost anything is possible and this prototype takes part at Fort Lytton QLD, Australia.

Controls: Listed in-game on the main menu after selected 'How-To Play'.

Required Hardware: VR (Vive, Index or HP Reverb G2)
